name: DJMAX RAY
summary: DJMax Ray was developed by Pentavision Studio and published by Neowiz Internet. A teaser for this game was released on 22th August, 2012 in Tap Sonic YouTube accounts. But it not shown the gameplay screen. The game will release for Apple iOS only.
info:
• 中文名: 乐动DJMAX
